item.title: 美国参议院小组扩大对宝马使用被禁中国供应商零部件的调查范围
item.description: 参议院财政委员会主席周一表示，他将扩大对德国汽车制造商宝马使用一家被禁中国供应商的电子元件的调查。【原文：The chair of the Senate Finance Committee on Monday said he was expanding its probe into German automaker BMW's use of electronic components from a banned Chinese supplier.】

item.title: 美国最高法院驳回克罗格对 Grubhub 商标胜诉的质疑
item.description: 美国最高法院周一拒绝考虑连锁超市克罗格（Kroger）的请求，即阻止 Grubhub 使用食品配送公司的叉刀标志，理由是该标志会与克罗格餐包服务公司 Home Chef 的标志产生混淆。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court declined on Monday to consider supermarket chain Kroger's request to block Grubhub's use of the food-delivery company's fork-and-knife logo based on allegations that it would cause confusion with the Kroger meal-kit service Home Chef's logo.】

item.title: 美国最高法院将审理 Facebook 要求撤销股东诉讼的请求
item.description: 美国最高法院周一同意审理 Meta 旗下脸书公司（Facebook）提出的一项请求，以阻止一项私人证券欺诈诉讼，该诉讼指控该社交媒体平台在 2017 年和 2018 年误导投资者，称该公司和第三方滥用其用户数据。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court agreed on Monday to hear a bid by Meta's Facebook to scuttle a private securities fraud lawsuit accusing the social media platform of misleading investors in 2017 and 2018 about the misuse of its user data by the company and third parties.】

item.title: 巴西五月通胀数据将加速
item.description: 据路透社周一公布的一项民意调查显示，巴西 5 月份的消费者物价数据可能会显示通胀加速，反映出近期南部灾难性洪灾造成的损失。【原文：Brazil's consumer price data for May will likely show an acceleration in inflation, reflecting the damage from recent disastrous floods in the south, according to a Reuters poll published on Monday.】

item.title: 英伟达分拆股票后可能被纳入道琼斯指数引发热议
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）旨在吸引散户投资者的 10 拆 1 股票拆细计划已经生效，这引发了人们对这家人工智能领军企业被纳入蓝筹股道指的可能性的猜测。【原文：Nvidia's 10-for-1 stock split aimed at luring retail investors has taken effect, sparking speculation over chances of the artificial intelligence bellwether's inclusion in the blue-chip Dow index.】

item.title: 西南航空在报道埃利奥特入股 20 亿美元后大涨
item.description: 在《华尔街日报》报道激进投资者埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）已在美国西南航空公司建立了近 20 亿美元的股份后，西南航空公司的股价在周一盘前交易中上涨了约 7%。【原文：Southwest Airlines' shares rose about 7% in premarket trade on Monday after the Wall Street Journal reported that activist investor Elliott Investment Management had built a nearly $2 billion stake in the U.S. carrier.】

item.title: 古巴向俄罗斯人和中国人示好，以重振萎靡不振的旅游业
item.description: 一个工作日的早晨，俄罗斯游客谢尔盖-博亚里什尼奇（Serguei Boyaryshnic）在家人的陪伴下，惊奇地漫步在哈瓦那老城粉色的建筑和鹅卵石街道之间。【原文：Russian tourist Serguei Boyaryshnic wandered in awe among the pastel-colored buildings and cobblestone streets of Old Havana on a weekday morning, his family in tow.】

item.title: 早间新闻马克龙呼吁立即举行大选，欧洲为之震动
item.description: 塞缪尔-因迪克对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Samuel Indyk】

item.title: 通胀数据和美联储会议公布前，降息忧虑令期指下滑
item.description: 美国股指期货周一走低，原因是投资者在关键的通胀数据和定于本周召开的央行政策会议前持谨慎态度。【原文：U.S. stock index futures inched lower on Monday as investors were cautious ahead of key inflation data and a central bank policy meeting scheduled for this week.】

item.title: 星际客机的飞行是波音太空舱迈出的一大步，但仍存在许多障碍
item.description: 波音公司的 "星际客机"（Starliner）航天器上周取得了一项重要成就，向国际空间站运送了两名宇航员。【原文：Boeing's Starliner spacecraft scored a crucial achievement last week with the delivery of two astronauts to the International Space Station, but problems encountered along its journey in space and more hurdles that lie ahead make the aerospace giant's goal toward routine missions a distant prospect.】

item.title: 人工智能是 2024 年苹果 WWDC 的唯一焦点
item.description: 预计苹果公司将在周一举行的年度开发者大会上展示其如何在软件套件中整合人工智能，包括改版后的 Siri 语音助手以及可能与 ChatGPT 所有者 OpenAI 建立的合作关系。【原文：Apple is expected to showcase how it is integrating artificial intelligence across its software suite, including a revamped Siri voice assistant and a possible tie-up with ChatGPT owner OpenAI, at its annual developer conference on Monday.】

item.title: 美国就业报告中的 "好消息 "和 "坏消息
item.description: 最新的美国薪资报告几乎没有解决就业市场走向的争论，为 "软着陆 "的信奉者和怀疑者提供了充足的素材，他们都在怀疑美联储能否在不使数百万工人失业的情况下抑制通胀。【原文：The latest U.S. payrolls report did little to settle the debate about where the job market is headed, with ample fodder for both "soft-landing" believers and doubters over whether the Federal Reserve can tame inflation without sending millions of workers onto the jobless rolls.】

item.title: 美联储的新经济预测可能会有 "可能 "和 "不可能 "之分
item.description: 预计本周美联储官员的最新经济预测将显示，降息次数将少于决策者三个月前的预期，预期通胀率将加快，经济增长将放缓，这一精确的经济前景将成为美国中央银行权威的重中之重。【原文：Updated economic projections from Federal Reserve officials this week are expected to show fewer interest rate cuts than policymakers anticipated three months ago, faster expected inflation, and slower growth, a pinpoint economic outlook that will carry the weight of the U.S. central bank's authority.】

item.title: 聚焦：特斯拉求助于马斯克的小股东粉丝，支持 560 亿美元的发薪日
item.description: 由于特斯拉的主要股东在是否支持埃隆-马斯克 560 亿美元的薪酬方案问题上出现分歧，该公司也在寻求散户投资者的支持，因为散户投资者在这家电动汽车制造商的所有权基础中所占比例异常之高。【原文：With major Tesla shareholders appearing divided over whether to endorse Elon Musk's $56 billion pay package, the company also is looking for support from retail investors who make up an unusually high percentage of the electric carmaker's ownership base.】

item.title: 阿斯顿-马丁将把英国员工的年薪提高 4
item.description: 英国豪华汽车制造商阿斯顿-马丁（Aston Martin）周一表示，将在 2024 年和 2025 年为其英国生产基地和办事处的 2500 多名员工和承包商提高 4% 的年薪。【原文：British luxury carmaker Aston Martin said on Monday it would raise annual pay by 4% for more than 2,500 employees and contractors across its UK manufacturing sites and offices for 2024 and 2025.】

item.title: 独家报道卢尼被解雇后，英国石油公司收紧工作场所关系政策
item.description: 继前首席执行官伯纳德-卢尼（Bernard Looney）因未披露与同事的亲密关系而被解雇后，英国石油公司（BP）在一份政策更新中告诉员工，员工必须披露与同事的任何亲密关系，否则将面临失去工作的风险。【原文：BP employees must disclose any intimate relationships with colleagues or risk losing their jobs, the oil major told staff in a policy update, following the sacking of former CEO Bernard Looney for failing to do so.】

item.title: FACTBOX 美国能源行业整合将持续到 2024 年
item.description: 美国能源行业的整合浪潮曾在 2023 年引发了价值 2500 亿美元的交易，但这股浪潮已延续到今年，因为各公司都在寻找机会，部署其囤积的现金并增加储备。【原文：The consolidation wave in the U.S. energy sector that triggered $250 billion worth of deals in 2023 has stretched into this year, as companies look for opportunities to deploy their cash hoard and boost their reserves.】

item.title: 日本 5 月服务业景气创近两年新低
item.description: 日本政府周一公布的数据显示，由于日元疲软导致燃料和食品成本上升，拖累了家庭支出，日本服务业景气度在 5 月份恶化至近两年来从未有过的水平。【原文：Japan's service sector sentiment worsened in May to levels unseen in nearly two years, government data showed on Monday, as rising fuel and food costs from a weak yen dragged on household spending.】

item.title: 在欧盟权衡关税之际，欧洲各国竞相争夺中国电动汽车工厂和就业岗位
item.description: 欧洲各国政府可能对中国电动汽车充斥其市场的预算持谨慎态度，但它们也在激烈争夺新竞争者带来的制造业投资和就业机会。【原文：European governments may be wary of budget Chinese electric vehicles flooding their markets but they're also fiercely competing for a share of the manufacturing investment and jobs the new competitors bring.】

item.title: 澳大利亚九大娱乐公司称彼得-科斯特洛卸任董事长一职
item.description: 澳大利亚广播公司 Nine Entertainment Co Holdings Ltd 表示，其董事长彼得-科斯特洛（Peter Costello）已于周六辞职，并由非执行副董事长凯瑟琳-韦斯特（Catherine West）接替。【原文：Australian broadcaster Nine Entertainment Co Holdings Ltd said its chairman Peter Costello resigned on Saturday and has been replaced by non executive deputy chair Catherine West.】

item.title: 市场中：美国如何让世界胆战心惊地寻找美元替代品
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）被定罪后，一些有权势的美国人对法治提出了质疑。【原文：The United States is merrily chipping away at the pillars that hold up the dollar as the world's reserve currency, with the latest blows coming from some powerful Americans questioning the rule of law following the conviction of Donald Trump.】

item.title: 欧洲 汇率和政治给市场蒙上阴影
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 亚洲股市下跌；政治不确定性笼罩欧元
item.description: 周一，亚洲股市下挫，原因是鉴于美国劳动力市场依然紧张，交易商大幅削减了对美联储今年降息的押注，而法国的临时大选呼吁引发了更广泛的政治担忧，并对欧元构成拖累。【原文：Asian stocks sank on Monday as traders heavily pared back on bets for Federal Reserve rate cuts this year given a still-tight U.S. labour market, while a snap election call in France sparked wider political concerns and weighed on the euro.】

item.title: 马克龙呼吁法国大选，欧元跌至一个月低点
item.description: 由于法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙在欧盟投票中被极右翼势力击败，要求举行一次震撼性选举，欧元周一下跌，而美元在本周晚些时候的美联储会议前持稳。【原文：The euro fell on Monday as the French President Emmanuel Macron called a shock election after being trounced in the European Union vote by the far-right, while the dollar was steady ahead of the Federal Reserve meeting later in the week.】

item.title: 蓝图草案显示，日本政府将呼吁在价格不确定的情况下采取灵活政策
item.description: 路透社看到的一份日本政府年度经济蓝图草案显示，在消费疲软和通胀前景不明朗的情况下，日本政府将强调与央行密切合作的必要性，并 "灵活 "地引导政策。【原文：Japan's government will highlight the need to work closely with the central bank and guide policy "flexibly" in the wake of soft consumption and uncertainty over the inflation outlook, a draft of its annual economic blueprint seen by Reuters showed.】

item.title: 美元因美国就业数据走强而下滑
item.description: 周一，油价连续第二个交易日走低，受美元走强拖累，原因是上周五美国就业数据强劲，进一步推低了降息预期。【原文：Oil prices nudged lower for a second straight session on Monday, weighed down by a firmer dollar as expectations of interest rate cuts were pushed out further following strong U.S. jobs data on Friday.】

item.title: 日本第一季度国内生产总值降幅低于首次报告，原因是资本支出有所调整
item.description: 日本政府周一公布的数据显示，由于资本支出升级，1-3 月份日本经济萎缩程度低于最初报告的程度。【原文：Japan's economy contracted less than initially reported in January-March, due to upgrades in capital expenditure, government data showed on Monday.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，埃利奥特以近 20 亿美元入股西南航空
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周日援引知情人士的话报道，激进投资者埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）已持有西南航空公司近 20 亿美元的股份，并计划推动旨在扭转该公司业绩不佳局面的变革。【原文：Activist investor Elliott Investment Management has built a nearly $2 billion stake in Southwest Airlines and plans to push for changes aimed at reversing the airline's underperformance, the Wall Street Journal reported on Sunday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国推进住宅去库存给开发商带来的喜悦不多
item.description: 分析师和开发商表示，由于该计划规模有限且价格可能较低，中国通过将未售出房屋转化为经济适用房来清理大量库存的努力不太可能帮助资金短缺的开发商。【原文：China's efforts to clear massive inventory by turning unsold homes into affordable housing are unlikely to help cash-strapped developers due to the programme's limited size and potentially low prices, analysts and developers say.】

item.title: 早间投标：日本央行和美联储迫在眉睫，削减风险敞口
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】
